Well I need to be honest, This is one of the most stupid things I ever saw in my entire life! what is the point to have korean subs in the movie lol! When the international language is English! Besides that you can't even deactivate or something is impossible! what a big epic fail!

@Heliorodrigues: You are one the most stupid things I have ever seen. The point of having Korean subs in the film is for the benefit of the KOREAN people for which this particular copy of  the movie was released for.

What do you mean "international language english"? Are you one of the less intellectual people who think english is everyones first language, which of course it is not... You are the epic fail my friend.

@marlee82 - If you are one of those "less intellectual" people who don't know that English is the international language, then maybe you should consult Google on the matter before calling people more informed than yourself names.

Thanks for the up!

@Reginaald-you can still see the screenshots even from imageshack, just copy the link and paste it into a new tab, it is the redirect from TPB that blocks the image.  Try researching or understanding before going off on someone doing you a favor
